dmca.title: DMCA Complaint
dmca.body:
-----Forwarded Message----- 
From: Emerald City Productions Inc 
Sent: May 31, 2006 3:45 AM 
To: emeraldcity1@earthlink.net 
Subject: DMCA Complaint 


sirs:
 
 
sirs:
 
i edward b. przydzial of:
1615 wilcox avenue north # 3919 los angeles california 90028
file my statements under **penalty of perjury**, the the above
information is accurate and that i am the copyright or intellectual
property owner or authorized to act on the copyright or intellectual 
property owner's behalf. i expect immediate remedy.
 
thank you,
 
 
 
 
edward przydzial
emeraldcityrecords.com
 



 
-----Forwarded Message----- 
From: Copyright 
Sent: May 30, 2006 12:04 PM 
To: edwardprzydzial@earthlink.net 
Cc: Theplanet@chillingeffects.org 
Subject: DMCA Complaint 



To Whom It May Concern:
 
Please note that the attached copyright infringement notice does not substantially
comply with the required notification elements of the Digital Millennium Copyright
Act of 1998 ("DMCA").
 
Please note that we have not passed on the substantive merits of your claim.
 
Please visit our web site at www.theplanet.com/legal.
 
Legal Response Team
THEPLANET.COM INTERNET SERVICES, INC.
